title: Connect with Australia's emerging tech talent
desc: Share and demonstrate your company's expertise to your students by running workshops, Q&A panels, or networking events in the lead-up to the hackathon.
You can run your events remotely or at your company headquarters. We can even partner with other IT student societies so you can access even more students - at no extra cost.

title: Help shape future leaders
desc: Send company representatives to directly engage with and help students during the event. Students connect with mentors through various methods - including structured mentoring sessions, in person, or through Discord.
Whether you're hands-on with code, a holistic product person, or a designer passionate about user experience, we want you to be a mentor!

title: Brand outreach - done right
desc: Reach and connect with some of the brighest and smartest people in our universities today.
We have many opportunities including having your brand across event collateral, and running in-event opportunties such as giveaways and workshops.
In addition, promote your brand and career opportunities through our social media channels and email newsletters that reach competitors and university students alike.

title: Share the love

title: API and Tools Roundup
desc: Closer to the event, we generate campaigns around software, hardware or various tools provided by companies. Promote to our 200+ competitors and get them to adopt your product today!
